Chair, Capital Ambition Board, London Councils
Chairman, Megalith Realty Ltd.
The Corporation is a subscribing member of London Councils, of which I serve on the Leaders' Committee.
The Corporation also provides accommodation (Southwark Street) and legal, payroll, HR, training and other services to London Councils.
Bridge House Estates provides grant support to Trust for London of which I am a Trustee, nominated by the Corporation.
